channel.title: Marc Scape - V1 - D Claws/All GS Specs
channel.description:
check out v2 or v3 LINK to V2: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436965.msg3210767.html#msg3210767
Credits: Me 20% EvolutionX- 40% Xell Scape- 40%
Features: 1. Pvp Armor And weapons with many other customs 2. Minigames 3. Monsters 4. Good home 5. Skilling area at Home and Catherby 6. Shops at home and Varrock 7. All specs working for every weapon - alot more but i cant put everything in features
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2061xs5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xpyn21.png[/img]

Client- http://www.mediafire.com/?yzmj1g2jmnm
COMMENT IF YOUR USING THIS

item.title: Marc Scape - V1 - D Claws/All GS Specs
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“WiseMen, post:53, topic:340052”][quote author=wwe4eva link=topic=436430.msg3209686#msg3209686 date=1274128877]
Suggestions for V2;

Get the correct Models for Dagon’Hai
Get rid of them crappy, images for teleports.
Make it %1 not %1% on the Run image
You get to Varrock via Falador teleport? Lul…

I know there nothing major, but they could be the difference between it being an awesome server and a poor server.

Greetings,
[/quote]

And he could also make Edgeville the home, and then add a multi teleport in magebook Like

Lumbridge
Catherby
Camelot
varrock
All them places
4-5 per teleport (2 teleports)[/quote]

Edge was old home and i hated it

Read full topic

item.title: Marc Scape - V1 - D Claws/All GS Specs
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“WiseMen, post:46, topic:340052”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=436430.msg3208852#msg3208852 date=1274043799]

Client.Java to change home right? And where the ::home commands at the #### are I change those to the spot at wherever?

How can I make it so if they do ::home they tele to like 4 different places.

Why would one tele take you to four different places?
[/quote]

I mean like 4 different places in Edgevile…

  1. Near general store
  2. In that house, where the Yews are.
  3. Near the wild, inbetween the two shops/house.
  4. Near the bank…

EDIT; Where is your No-Ip? I cannot seem, to find that shit. Yo’[/quote]

Ya you could make the teleport do that.

For the no-ip if you mean changing the client ip it is set on 0.0.0.0 or localhost.

Read full topic

item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

quote author=marcbob link=topic=436430.msg3209152#msg3209152 date=1274062368]

[quote=“Mod Fuzion, post:42, topic:340052”]dear Math Wizard,

when you give credits keep in mind that percents are out of 100. so therefore 20+30+20=80.
so try making them add up to 100.

another thing try:
xellscape- 50%
you- 20%
evolutionx- 30%[/quote]

Back atcha considering my credits are correct. But thanks for trying to be smart
[/quote]

Obv you edited the Credits -.- Anyways who cares it was a small mistake but funny =)

Read full topic
